News.headline: Loan Update: 17th January 2017
News.short_description: Update on Daggers Loan players Shepherd, Barnwell and Berkowicz
News.description:
Right back Jimmy Shepherd played the full 90 minutes for Billericay Town as they lost 4-1 away to Leiston FC on Saturday.

Forward Shomari Barnwell played sixty seven minutes for Bishopâ€™s Stortford as they lost away to Bath City 2-0, with the club staying 21st in the table.

Striker Jakub Berkowicz helped Barkingside get their first point of 2017 as they shared a draw away at Hullbridge Sports on Saturday.

Berkowicz opened the scoring for Barkingside before the game ended 2-2 between the two sides.
